actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I. The next meeting is scheduled for 1:30 p.m. on August 29, 2025.

Pursuant to section 2406(b)(3) of Public Law 116-9, and the order of the House of January 3, 2025, the Speaker appointed the following members of the House to the Adams Memorial Commission: Mr. Moolenaar, Mr. Griffith, Mr. Lynch and Mr. Keating.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to clause 13 of Rule I, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Pastor Zack Randles, Waterfront Church, Washington DC
The Speaker designated the Honorable Richard Hudson to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
